snippet: Every Monday morning, we publish a New York Times photo without any caption, headline or other information about its origins. Join the conversation by posting about what you see and why in our comments section.
abstract: Every Monday morning, we publish a New York Times photo without any caption, headline or other information about its origins. Join the conversation by posting about what you see and why in our comments section.

headline.main: What's Going On in This Picture? | Dec. 10, 2012
